doc.title: Gadgets, Gadgets, Gadgets
doc.plot: Presented by Liz Bonnin, the programme features the latest and newest gadgets and technology from around the world. Tommy Sandhu also provides a fresh and fun look at the world of consumer gadgets with his reviews of the latest gadgets on the market. In a funny, fast paced and entertaining style, Gadgets Gadgets Gadgets takes the viewer on a whirlwind tour of the world of gadgets and technology. Looking at everything from the latest in Japanese phone technology to kart racing in Thailand, no stone is left unturned in the search for the most interesting technology and gadget news. From Brighton to Beijing, it really is a trip around the world to find the latest, best and quirkiest gadgets and technology.
